jobs.name: consciousness-hourly-prompts
jobs.description: Send consciousness prompts every hour (9am-8pm Ljubljana time)

jobs.name: consciousness-evening-form
jobs.description: Send evening reflection form at 7:30pm Ljubljana time

jobs.name: consciousness-morning-voice
jobs.description: Morning intention voice prompt (9:15am - strategic, cost-controlled)
jobs.note: Enable this for voice version of morning intention. Costs ~$0.30/month. Set ELEVEN_LABS_API_KEY env var.

jobs.name: consciousness-evening-sats-voice
jobs.description: Evening SATS voice guide (9:45pm - after reflection)
jobs.note: Enable this for voice SATS guide. Costs ~$0.30/month. Falls back to text if no API key.

jobs.name: consciousness-weekly-summary
jobs.description: Generate and send weekly progress summary (Sundays at 8pm)

setup_instructions.openclaw_cron: To install these cron jobs in OpenClaw, use the cron management interface or add them manually to your cron configuration.

environment_variables.ELEVEN_LABS_API_KEY: Optional - For voice prompts (falls back to text without it)

cost_optimization.voice_prompts: Disabled by default. Enable only morning_intention for lowest cost (~$0.15/month). Enable both for max impact (~$0.30/month).
cost_optimization.api_calls: Text prompts cost nothing. Voice uses ~0.5Â¢ per generation.
